text: Martim Mércio da Silveira (2 March 1911 – 26 May 1972) better known as Martín Mercío Silveyra, was an Argentine-born Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. == References == * Milton Neves Category:1911 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Martim Silveira
